headline: WRITER Appoints Brian O'Reilly as First Chief Operating Officer
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, February 24, 2026--WRITER, the leader in agentic AI for the enterprise, today announced the appointment of Brian O'Reilly as its first Chief Operating Officer. O’Reilly will lead the global cross-functional operations that underpin WRITER’s unified, end-to-end customer journey, from initial strategy to scaled adoption. His leadership will strengthen WRITER’s ability to execute with the speed, reliability, and enterprise rigor demanded by the world’s largest organizations as agenti
